vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20Token._totalSupply (ERC20Token.sol#119) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (ERC20Token.sol#208-214)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Token._totalSupply should be constant (ERC20Token.sol#119)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ERC20Token.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (ERC20Token.sol#21): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (ERC20Token.sol#111): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_to' of ERC20Token.transfer (ERC20Token.sol#125) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_value' of ERC20Token.transfer (ERC20Token.sol#125) is not in mixedCase
